txt.en: You have been tasked with travelling to Sûri-kylä in Forochel and finding a potential visitor who might accept an invitation to visit Furtherholm for the Midsummer Festival. You should look around Sûri-kylä for potential visitors.
Lossoth bothered ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Khâtaphos believes that there may be some among the Lossoth of Forochel who could use a tropical holiday.
'Are you serious? I will pack immediately!'
'Such a place exists? I must see it for myself. I will make this journey!'
Completed Gathering Guests: Sûri-kylä
You see some potential visitors
'How dare you ask me to abandon my tribe? Be gone!'

'In the far northern lands of Eriador, there lies an icy wasteland called Forochel. There lives a people I have read about called 'Lossoth' that live in the cold snow. I think they could do with some sun and sand, don't you?

'Go to their largest village, Sûri-kylä, and find someone who might cheerfully accept an invitation. Mind that you do not bother too many people who would not be open to such a journey, or people will think you a pest and grow to have a poor opinion of us.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
'Do you not know of my troubles? Take your nonsense and leave.'
You have found potential visitors in Sûri-kylä. You should choose one who is most likely to accept an invitation to visit Furtherholm for the Midsummer Festival and invite them.
TBD
'There are already too few Lumi-väki, and you think travelling wise? No, that is foolishness.'
TBD
'Why are you bothering me with this? Go away.'
'When you are ready, go to Sûri-kylä in Forochel and find someone to invite to visit us in Furtherholm.'
Find potential visitors in Sûri-kylä
Invite someone to visit Furtherholm
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not bother people ([placeholder]/[placeholder])</rgb>
TBD - Talk to TBD
'Go on holiday to somewhere warm? What a wonderful idea!'
Gathering Guests: Sûri-kylä
